name: Not What it Seems (Alluysl)
description:
A two-player co-op shooter with its controls inspired from the flash game "Tank Trouble" I played a lot of in my childhood, with climbing and stairs as a bonus.

Hope you'll enjoy this short experience and have fun with it :)

Controls:

- yellow: WASD and space bar

- red: arrow keys and numpad enter

- Enter (Return) when asked for

- Alt Tab or Alt f4 to leave
